CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 34 Some copolymers based on 9,10-arene functionalized anthracene have recently been reported , but the absorption ranges of the polymers are limited to the wavelengths shorter than 700 nm and their PCEs are moderate , 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's break down the paragraph and identify the "Material Name" entities:

1. "copolymers" - This is a Material Name entity.
2. "anthracene" - This is a Material Name entity.
3. "polymers" - This is a Material Name entity.
4. "9,10-arene" - This is a Material Name entity.

So, there are four Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. Copolymers
2. Anthracene
3. Polymers
4. 9,10-arene
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. Copolymers
2. Anthracene

So, there are two Material Name entities in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Copolymers |
| Anthracene |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 34 Some copolymers based on 9,10-arene functionalized anthracene have recently been reported , but the absorption ranges of the polymers are limited to the wavelengths shorter than 700 nm and their PCEs are moderate , 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. "absorption ranges" - This is a property of the polymers, referring to the range of wavelengths that the polymers can absorb light at.
2. "PCEs" - This is an abbreviation for "photoluminescence efficiency", which is a property of the polymers that refers to their ability to emit light.

So, the two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. absorption ranges
2. PCEs
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. absorption ranges - This refers to the range of wavelengths that the polymers can absorb light at, which is a material property.
2. PCEs - This refers to the photoluminescence efficiency, which is a measure of the ability of the polymers to emit light, and is a material property.

So, the two relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties are:

1. absorption ranges
2. PCEs

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption ranges |
| PCEs |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 34 Some copolymers based on 9,10-arene functionalized anthracene have recently been reported , but the absorption ranges of the polymers are limited to the wavelengths shorter than 700 nm and their PCEs are moderate , 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - This is the value of the efficiency of the solar cells, which is mentioned as 4-5%.
2. Wavelength - The paragraph mentions the absorption ranges of the polymers, which are limited to wavelengths shorter than 700 nm.

So, the two Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. Wavelength
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - This is the value of the efficiency of the solar cells, which is mentioned as 4-5%.

So, the only relevant entity in the paragraph that refers to the value of material properties is:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) | 4-5% |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
